import React, { useState } from "react"; import {Form, FormLabel, FormGroup, } from "react-bootstrap"; import SideBar from "../components/sidebar"; import {StateLGA} from '../data/stateLGAs'; //import Booking from "../components/bookingtab"; var todayDate = new Date().toISOString().slice(0, 10); const sortedStates = StateLGA.sort((a,b) => a.state > b.state ? 1:-1); const AddStaff = () =>{ const [stateLga, setStateLGA] = useState([]) const findLGA = (e)=>{ if(e.target.value !== "") { const query = sortedStates.filter(state => state.state === e.target.value); const result = query.lgas; setStateLGA(result); } else{ setStateLGA([]); } } return( <>

ADD STAFF

First Name:
Last Name:
Date of Birth:
Sex:
State of Origin: { sortedStates.map(stateItem => ) }
LGA: { stateLga.map(lga => ) }
Travelling To

) } export default AddStaff
